## MessageChain.getAttachDirection() method

Calculates right attach direction between provided chain and this

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getAttachDirection(intersectionId: ChainId, update: this): LoadDirection;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  intersectionId | <code>ChainId</code> | id of first intersection item between update and this |
|  update | <code>this</code> | Chain provided to calculate right direction for possible upserting |

<b>Returns:</b>

`LoadDirection`
